General.Name: Banca Popolare di Sondrio ScpA
General.Description: Banca Popolare di Sondrio S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services in Italy. The company offers current accounts and sight deposits, savings deposits, certificates of deposits, fixed-term deposits, and bonds; and loans comprising foreign currency loans, artisan loans, agricultural loans, personal loans, and mortgage loans primarily to small and medium-sized businesses, and household customers. It also offers repurchase agreements, securities lending, custody and administration of securities, consultancy, individual portfolio management, guarantees, leasing, and factoring and confirming services. In addition, the company provides credit and debit cards, and insurance products, as well as collection and payment services; manages hotels; issues government securities and prime corporate bonds; and manages and maintains rented units. Banca Popolare di Sondrio S.p.A. was founded in 1871 and is headquartered in Sondrio, Italy.
General.Address: Piazza Giuseppe Garibaldi 16, Sondrio, SO, Italy, 23100
